description: A React functional component implementing a modal dialog to display detailed Jira project information, including project details, stats, roles, and issue types. The component fetches additional project data on mount and handles loading/error states.

methods.name: fetchProjectDetails
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about the project from Jira API using provided credentials and project key.

methods.name: getProjectUrl
methods.description: Constructs a URL link to the Jira project based on the credentials domain and project key.

methods.name: getProjectTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an emoji icon representing the project type (e.g., 'software', 'business').

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Converts a date string into a localized date format; defaults to 'Unknown' on error.
